pullrequest.title: Make sensors Visuals so they can have Visuals attached

content.raw: spoke with @iche033 offline and rather than modify the orbit view controller which will reorganise the scene graph, we will change Nodes to support having other Nodes attached to them \(currently only available for Visuals\). That way Sensors can still be Nodes \(it doesn’t make sense for them to be Visuals because can’t have meshes set etc\), but will no longer be required to be leaf nodes and can have other nodes attached.
